title: Labor Day Hunt
description: Jared Rodgers needed cash and had to work, while the rest of his hometown got to kick back and enjoy Labor Day. After answering a job ad in the local paper, he is directed to an abandoned warehouse. An ominous feeling grips him as soon as he enters the boarded-up building. By the time he realizes whatâ€™s going on, the hunt has already begun.A short story.
author: Calvin  Demmer
